title: restratagem
author: restratagem
content: Stratus Public Presale is Live!https://presale.restratagem.com/Restratagem is at the forefront of blockchain innovation, introducing the Stratus Token (STRAT), a transformative token designed to redefine the digital landscape. STRAT functions as a versatile payment method within our ecosystem, creating an efficient and seamless transaction experience. It also serves as a unique incentive, fostering user engagement and loyalty towards our products and services. Most ambitiously, STRAT is set to fuel our native blockchain network, a layer-2 to Bitnet, aiming to rank amongst the top-performing and fastest blockchain networks in the industry. With Restratagem and STRAT, we are not just envisioning the future; we are actively building it.From today until the 29th of September (or until all tokens are sold) you will be able to purchase Stratus (STRAT) from our public presale dapp! The dapp is ran by a smart contract and all the process is handled in a decentralized manner. Your tokens will be received immediately and you will hold them directly in your wallet until the official launch and the creation of the LP on Xenwave.We are working hard to bring to all of you the best of the Web 3 and will try to make STRAT a household name within the Bitnet ecosystem, and in addition to STRAT listing on Xenwave, we will strive to have it listed in other centralized exchanges too, to facilitate the onboarding of new holders.You can buy your STRATs using reUSDT, and if you don't have anyÂ  yet, you can bridge it from BNB Chain for FREE (for a limited time). Visit https://bridge.xenwave.com/ now.Visit the presale website for more information and a link for the full pre-launch deck.Thank you all for your support!Restratagem: https://restratagem.com/
